entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Beauceville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:23 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.4Â°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Ice pellets or snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to ice pellets in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to freezing rain in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
